metadata.Title: CVE-2014-10402 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the DBI module through 1.643 for Perl. DBD::File drivers can open files from folders other than those specifically passed via the f_dir attribute in the data source name (DSN). NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2014-10401.

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.643-3build1').
